exit_steps.title: Abmeldung (Deregistration)
exit_steps.deadline: Between 7 days before and 14 days after moving
exit_steps.notes: Crucial for cancelling contracts like gym memberships, utilities, and insurance.

exit_steps.title: Health Insurance Cancellation
exit_steps.deadline: As soon as Abmeldung is received
requirements: Proof of new insurance in destination country
exit_steps.notes: You cannot cancel your insurance without proof of deregistration or new insurance.
